document.full_text: a bomb planted in a bag exploded near a bus stop in a jewish district of jerusalem on wednesday, killing a woman and injuring at least 30 people, in an attack police blamed on palestinian militants.
document.title: bombing near jerusalem bus stop kills woman, 30 hurt
lines_and_colors: a bomb planted in a bag exploded near a bus stop in a jewish district of jerusalem on wednesday, killing a woman and injuring at least 30 people, in an attack police blamed on palestinian militants.
